component.name: Trezor Suite
component.summary: Take control of your crypto in Trezor Suite

description.p: Trezor Suite is a comprehensive app for managing cryptocurrency securely. It connects with Trezor hardware wallets, allowing users to send, receive, and track digital assets. Key features include explicit transaction confirmation, hidden wallets for enhanced privacy, coin control, staking rewards, and support for a wide range of coins. It also integrates security features like Tor for anonymous browsing and Taproot for enhanced Bitcoin privacy.
*NOTE*: This is the official release of Trezor Suite, packaged into a Flatpak by the community. This repackaging is not yet supported by Trezor Company s.r.o
